title: Rectangular block of land at Colombo 05
details:
The perfect plot of land for your residence with a residential neighborhood. highly residential area with a quiet, calm and silent neighborhood.

This land consist of 20 perches bare land ready for you to construct. Suitable location, also being an ideal investment for a brighter future.

Easy access to Havelock road and Duplication road. Schools, Banks, Hospitals, Restaurants and other basic amenities within close range.

Enjoy life to the fullest in your dream home.

Call Linea Property for more inquiries.
